EmailTemplate.description: Added after go-live to differentiate from First Defect Notice
EmailTemplate.name: Final Rejection Notice EWP
EmailTemplate.subject: Rejection Notice: {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To {!License_Registration__c.Applicant__c}:
Your {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} application for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been rejected for not meeting all of the application requirements. Please review the attached Rejection Notice included in this e-mail, which lists the incomplete requirements. Also included in the attached notice is information on how you can continue the application process.
{!License_Registration__c.Registration_Site__c}
Sincerely, EWPU Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California Phone: (818) 901-5484
